Summary: This is my go-to hotel with every business or leisure trip I take to the Orange County area.  The staff is extremely friendly and helpful.  The rooms are always completely clean and the breakfast is great!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We arrived in this hotel Friday night April around 8 pm. The hotel was absolutely sparkling clean . 24 hours coffee, tea, and chocolate milk in front of the Hotel Registration . The staff are so friendly and very approachable . Our room was very clean , a lot of plugs for cellphone or any other device . We called for towels and in less than 5 minutes , someone was knocking in our door . We absolutely love every details of the hotel . There are certainly rules to follow like curfew but will not  change the fact that this hotel has great value for money , cleanliness and staff are very efficient . I will definitely be back if I am in the area.
Manager Response: Hello Elisaadens, we are happy to hear your stay with us was amazing and the staff went above and beyond on delivery of you requests . We hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: We arrived on Super Bowl afternoon. The man who checked us in was great, he was funny and friendly. It was nice to be treated so well. The hotel had a fun set up for the game. The room was clean and very quiet. We will be coming back next time in the area.
Manager Response: It was our utmost pleasure to serve you and our team was excited preparing for Super Bowl weekend.  Thank you for your review and glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: The reason we stayed here is because it’s pet friendly. It’s close off the freeway and we traveled for soccer so close to the soccer park as well. Hilton never disappoints. The breakfast never disappoints as well. Everyone was friendly and it’s a Hilton… always great service
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and 5 star review.  It's greatly appreciated. We are so happy you chose us for your stay and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Tried to check in yesterday this place is absolutely filthy. Hair balls on the floor, dirty stained carpet. Bad smell. No other words. Tried 2 rooms, checked the filthy pool and brown water hot tub. Run far away from this disgusting place. Really upsetting
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at Hampton Inn Irvine Spectrum Lake Forest.  We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. Your feedback is important as our goal is to ensure every guest feels at home while staying with us and that our hotel is always 100% clean.  Please feel free to reach out to me at the hotel to share your concerns.  We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.

Summary: Hotel has it all for the passing through traveler.  Location right off the 405/5.  Cleanliness.  Good breakfast.  Easy parking.  Reasonable price. Friendly staff.  Quiet. We had a room right off the elevator and didn't hear a thing all night.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for a wonderful review and feedback.  Wishing you a wonderful holiday season and a fantastic new year.

Summary: Arrived back at my favorite hotel.  I must say that it feels like home away from home. I was greated by Lisa and Loyd by name and a warm smile. Julian was extremely helpful with questions we had and notified me once he found the answer. Claire was behind the bar and friendly as ever as she made the perfect  Old Fashion. As always exceptional customer service from an exceptional staff.
Manager Response: Tim, welcome back home! We all are so happy to have you here. Thank you for always choosing to stay with us and recognizing Lisa, Lloyd, Julian and of course Claire. Happy Holidays.

Summary Heading: Must stay if you want to enjoy a place
Summary: First of all I never walked in a hotel and be met with a  very  pleasant smell that was awesome.second I was greeted by Lloyd, next I had pleasant conversation with Nour  next day and she helped me reserve next stay. The room  was very clean and pleasant colors. Antony and the breakfast team were great too. And of course Lisa the Am was very nice and Elisha wow great team you guys having fyi. So please for all of you thank you for making me believe that we can find good place to stay.  Anyone in the hotel business go and learn from them how to be pleasant. They were amazing
Room tip: Enjoy the team kindness and willing to help with a smile
Manager Response: Thank you, what an amazing review and feedback. I certainly appreciate that our team went above and beyond to meet your expectations. Thank you for recognizing the team, all those who were mentioned that brought such delight in making your stay pleasant.  Do come back to visit us again soon.

Summary: The staff was very accommodating for our large group.  They attended to all our needs.  The facilities were very clean.  The rooms comfortable and all the staff were friendly.  The kitchen staff prepared our group with a Thanksgiving meal that was excellent!  The breakfast choices were excellent and changed each day.  No hesitation to stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us over others.  We are happy that you and your team enjoyed your stay and that we were able to provide a Thanksgiving meal to your liking. We hope to see you and your team again.

Summary: Great 6 day stay! Very clean rooms and comfortable bed, pillows and duvet. 24 hr coffee/tea service. Excellent conference room and fitness room (2 peletons, large weight rack etc…), convenient access to freeway. A+ service from front desk, housekeeping, and restaurant
Manager Response: Great feedback, thank you so much. I am happy that our team was able to provide A+ service that went above and beyond your expectation.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: Best Experience Staying at a Hotel
Summary: The general manager Nigel was very accommodating. He made our stay a great experience. His staff were all super professional and nice. The entire hotel was clean. We would recommend this hotel to anyone. We are so excited for our next visit!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for not only recognizing Nigel but the entire team.  We were so happy to have you and your family staying with us and I hope that you do come back to visit us again. Thank you for sharing your experience.

Summary: Great staff and amenities. Beds are fantastic. Good location. This hotel is new and very clean. The staff is excellent and provides great service. The hotel bar is welcoming and the food is good. Rooms are a good size and the beds are fantastic.
Manager Response: Awesome review if I must say. Our team was happy to accommodate your hockey team travelling from Canada.  It was certainly a great opportunity and experience, thank you.

Summary Heading: Great experience for our hockey team
Summary: We had a positive experience as we came from Canada for a hockey tournament. The hotel was great to deal with and there were many thoughtful/convenient aspects including a coffee and tea bar that operated 24 hours. The staff were helpful and the kitchen was great too. Recommended.
Manager Response: Thanks you for rating us and your feedback, our team truly appreciates it. We are all extremely happy that you had a great experience and that we made your stay extra special.  Thank you for vising us all the way from Canada.

Summary: I really enjoyed my stay at the hotel. The food at the restaurant was very tasty and the live music was such a happy surprise. My friends and I loved listening to the live music by Alex! They also had a great selection of drinks at the bar
Manager Response: Thank you so much. Alex has certainly added to the overall experience of our guests. So much great feedback about the live music and appreciate it so much. Thank you.

Summary: This is a newer model Hampton with the more square shaped rooms. Bright and cheerful decor, tall ceilings, way better than old Hampton's.   I drove in late. i wasn't told about pay parking. pay parking at Hampton is rare. Make a bigger deal of this even in Orange County because your visitors are not used to this at Hampton.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the 5 star review and feedback, much appreciated.  WE look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I can rate it good only because for me front desk folks are very important but since they are not as friendly and accommodating as i expect in every hotel i go to so i can only give you 3stars. The management really need to improve their trainings to their front dest people. Be very friendly, energetic and accommodating and helpful. Some of them are really not nice!!! I even encounter rude one short lady i think shes african american. On duty in the morning.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and feedback, it is appreciated and will assist with further training.

Summary Heading: Overall a wonderful experience and the cleanliness of the hotel was insanely impressive. We will be back in the future
Summary: As someone who has not normally stayed at Hampton Inn by Hilton, my family and I were throughly impressed by the quality of the room. It was extremely clean and the worries I have had previously about a dirty hotel room left me instantly. Additionally, as this is a new location that sprung up a couple of years ago, my family and I appreciated how quiet and calm the location was despite being close to the freeway, especially in comparison to the rest of Los Ángeles. We truly appreciate the services Hampton Inn provided and will be sure to recommend it to friends and family members.
Manager Response: Thank you for such a positive feedback and review. We are so happy that you had a wonderful experience . Also, thank you for sharing your experience with family and friends.  Please do come back and visit us again soon.

Summary: Nigel and Claire are the best! Had a great experience! Hotel was so clean and staff was amazing !would definitely recommend this hotel to our friends! Thanks you for a fun wonderful stay!hopefully we will be back soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and amazing review. We appreciate recognizing our team, especially Nigel and Claire.  Our team looks forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Claire and Nigel are THE BEST!!!
Summary: Nigel and Clare were awesome.   Their customer service was the best. We spent the weekend with our softball team and they were so accommodating. We’ll be back for sure thanks to the warm welcome. Thank you.
Manager Response: Claire and Nigel are the BEST.  Thank you for recognizing them.  I'm happy that they both were able to create such a positive experience for that you were able to share it with others. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: My company has had an extended stay for the past few months and while the time away from home comes with its own set of challenges, since I’ve been here at the Homewood suites, I can honestly say that this place has become my home away from home. The polite and attentive staff like manager, Nigel and front desk, Lloyd have ensured that my stay is as comfortable and hassle free as can be. Additionally the cleaning staff has worked to keep the place clean, inviting, and safe in a post COVID world. Finally, bartenders like, Tawny and Claire offer service that goes above and beyond creating a warm and truly homey space where me and my coworkers can unwind and enjoy all that the kitchen staff has too offer. In truth EVERYONE at Hilton has helped make work feel more like a vacation
Manager Response: Our hotel is definitely a home away from home and we certainly appreciate you saying so. I am extremely prod of my team and it gives me great joy that the go above and beyond to serve our guests.  Thank you for recognizing all of them.

Summary: Had a wonderful stay while on business and had a quick and easy check in with minimal delay! Staff was attentive and made sure my stay was as pleasant and without much stress to worry about. Definitely staying here next time, and if you do as well, ask for Alex at the front desk 👌
Manager Response: Thank you for such a wonderful review and feedback as well as recognizing our team especially Alex.  We are all happy that you had a wonderful stay and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you.

Summary: Clean place & room, plenty of parking, & great staff! I’d have to say, Julian is just wonderful! He’s sincere, accommodating, he’s fast, he’s very helpful - you got a great person on your team, Hilton!! Hope he gets recognized!!! You guys are doing an awesome job.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at our hotel! I hope you felt at home.  We appreciate the staff recognition as we do as well, thank you. We can’t wait to welcome you home again soon!

Summary: Being a Hilton Diamond member you stay and come across all types of properties. You choose Hilton for their hospitality.  Their front desk employee here named Floyd needs some serious lessons in the hospitality field.  We check in the early evening for one night, and were asked by the young lady if we would be parking, we replied yes. She has us sign something saying the charge is $12.00 for overnight parking. Well we check out of the hotel only a few hours later so we never stayed overnight. Somehow we were still charged for 2 cars for overnight parking.  Also we received a change of $12.00 on top of that for a gift shop purchase. I’m the only one with my name on the reservation and room. And I did not make that purchase.  No worries, a simple call to the front desk this should
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.

Summary: This wonderful hotel is extremely accommodating, I arrived earlier than expected and Gracie was able to check me in with no problems whatsoever.  Later on my AC was giving me issues, I called the front desk and a gentleman by the name of Julian was very helpful and walked me through it and we tried fixing it over the phone. We unfortunately couldn't get it to work and he send engineering right away. Exceptional staff . Will be recommending to my family and friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for our kind words and recognizing Gracie and Julian. We appreciate the 5 star rating and such a wonderful review; amazing feed back. Our team looks forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: Hotel is reasonable value for price, clean, comfortable, and well appointed. DO NOT book direct through Hilton or with the hotel itself - inventory and pricing is significantly more favorable via third party sites (specifically, agoda) and the hotel DOES NOT price match with third party sites.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate you choosing to stay with us.

Summary: Hotel is very clean! A very pleasant experience! I highly recommend staying here if ever finding yourself in lake forest. The staff was very friendly to me and my family and breakfast was pretty good. Thank you to Gracie and Tawny for greeting us with a smile and helping make our stay both seem less and welcoming. I would most definitely book here again anytime we’re in town!
Manager Response: Thank you for such a wonderful review and feedback. Our team was excited to have you stay with us and looks forward to your next visit.  Gracie and Tawny appreciates your kind words, thank you for recognizing them.

Summary: The place is clean and accessible to freeway and food. We stayed here with my family and upon arrival, the host greeted us. She seemed tired and was polite but the next morning she was there still, apparently 24 hour shift. She was then a bit short with me when I asked for ketchup. At the end, she got me the ketchup we asked for, but was very dismissive and seemed annoyed.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us recently and taking the time to post a review. We appreciate your feedback and apologize on behalf of the team as it seems we fell short your expectations. We hope you will give us another try and the opportunity to make your next stay an amazing and 5 star experience.

Summary: This staff was so kind and attentive. We hosted a meeting in one of the conference rooms for about 60 people and throughout the entirety of it all, the staff was just so accommodating and professional.  Also, shoutout to Aloha for helping organize our event! She's absolutely such a pleasure! The property itself is so clean, modern and well kept. Several of our guests stayed overnight and were absolutely enthralled by how wonderful their stay was.   10/10
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us and hosting your meeting here at the Hampton. It was our team's pleasure to serve you and your guests. Aloha, always does a tremendous job and goes the extra mile above and beyond in creating the utmost experience for her clients; so thank you for recognizing her. I sure she is thrilled that it was a perfect and amazing event. We look forward to hosting your next event in the near future hopefully.

Summary: My main man Lloyd at the front desk was always cheery and helpful.   Stayed Here before but this time was better than ever.   Thank you Lloyd for making me feel better when I'm not doing so well.   Will continue to stay at this property   Much appreciated
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words and feedback, we certainly appreciate it.  Thanks for recognizing Lloyd as well as the rest of the team. Thank you for choosing us. Looking forward to your next stay.

Summary: Fresh, modern hotel, crisp air throughout the hotel & room..my stay was peaceful, other guests mind their own business..front-desk team is courteous, efficient, helpful, professional, mild-mannered - they're great. The service crew, just as wonderful - like Esmeralda, she's friendly, approachable, hospitable - THANK YOU; the sincerity and consistency from this crew at Hampton is very much appreciated! ! !
Manager Response: Thank you for your for such and amazing review.  We are all happy that you had a great and enjoyable time while staying with us. Thanks for recognizing the team especially Esmeralda. It was our pleasure to be of service to you. We all look forward to your next vacay.

Summary: That was an exaggeration just to capture some attention, but WOW these workers you got here are insanely kind and very friendly and the fact they are such a great team together makes it all better. Had laughs while checking in and definitely made me want to check in next week since I know I can enjoy my stay and feel confident I’m covered incase anything, julian and Leo and Omg we can’t forget about Mary were absolutely amazing. I can’t say it enough when I say they were such a great help. The manager who’s name is Nigel Louis; was such a great person to the point I feel like I can say he is a friend of mine At this point. Please check these people out and have them here more often
Manager Response: This review definitely caught all our attention, had to stop what I was doing to read.  Truly amazing and thank you so much. We appreciate you and the team have enjoyed having their names mention. We are happy to share in your experience and look forward to having you with us always. This is your home away from your, thank you.

Summary: The bed was comfy, breakfast could’ve been better better but Yasmin recommended me to go to a little place about 10 minutes away and it was worth the drive. The front desk service overall was just spectacular and Takuya and Julian went above and beyond for me! Couldn’t ask for a better stay!
Manager Response: WOW!!! Great review and feedback. I am glad that Yasmin, Takuya and Julian went above and beyond to create at wonderful stay and experience. Thank you for your kind words.

Summary: Perfect place to stay! The staff here takes a lot pride what they do, whether is keeping the facilities clean to perfection or answering any questions. The front desk person, Julian, went above and beyond by showing me where the best places to eat and when I lost my room key. I will continue coming here whenever I’m town! Great job!
Manager Response: Manny, thank you for the 5 star rating and your amazing feedback.   I truly happy that our team was able to provide great hospitality and service.  Thank you for recognizing Julian, he certainly appreciates it.  The team looks forward to your next visit.

Summary: Amazing stay !! And I would definitely look at staying again and I would be happy to stay again. And the location was nice and the restrooms were very clean so that was nice. Overall stay was great. Friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for a great review, excellent feedback. Just happy that you had a great experience while staying with us and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Omg, how did I not know about this hotel?!?
Summary: Fabulous new huge clean rooms, with plenty of plug ins, great lighting, and quiet comfortable bed. The kitchen is amply supplied, new and very clean. We stayed in room 525, facing the freeway, it was quiet and the sunsets were spectacular.  This hotel has the usual amenities,  plus a great on site laundry.  This hotel has a separate breakfast area from the adjoining hotel with fresh hot coffee all day, The location is ideal and  within easy walking distance to lots of restaurants, and right off the freeway. Also, if you’re too lazy to walk to s restaurant, the food at the hotel is remarkably good. Lots of fresh sandwich’s, and soups. The front desk personnel is attentive, responsive, and professional. Thank you
Manager Response: Yes, OMG. This is an amazing review and an acknowledgment of our team and what they offer. You said it all in your review, touch on everything and we appreciate you so much.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us, we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Nigel L was a great help to me today! I’m doing this so he gets the recognition he deserves because this was top tier and I enjoyed my stay because of him. I pray this review gets the viewer ship it deserves.
Manager Response: Isaiah, your feedback back is awesome and appreciated. Thank you for staying with us and recognizing Nigel and the team and it's our pleasure to provide great costumer service.

Summary: All I can say is that this place is a five star and has great customer service the rooms are nice the breakfast is good you should definitely book your stay here if you ever come to Lake Forest even if you stay around the neighboring cities it should be the place you should say highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Nestor, I wanted to say thanks for your recent stay here at our hotel! Thank you for your feedback and the recommendation, our team appreciates you entirely.

Summary: This is a home away from home for me. That staff here is amazing. From the bar , Tawny is a blast. Nigel the GM makes our team feel comfortable and puts us at ease . Eric from sales is a riot during social hours on Wednesdays. I have not one complaint about this hotel. 10/10.
Manager Response: Jesse, thank you for recognizing Tawny and Nigel. I'm sure they appreciates you and enjoys the time you spend at the bar.  Thank you so much.

Summary Heading: Good stay very clean and modern
Summary: Very good stay with a very clean room and everything was close by including Irvine spectrum the service was good and the room was very quiet the pool was cool and so was the 24hr gym. The breakfast was good
Manager Response: Thank you for the Amazing feedback.  I am glad that he was able to provide you amazing service, a clean stay with a modern feel.  This is what we are all about and so very proud of our team.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Not in a glamorous location but very clean and comfortable.
Summary: Looks very unassuming from the outside, but inside it is new and updated. The bed is comfortable and shower is simple and clean. Room is a bit small and not much space for work area, however Wi-Fi is great and plenty of regular and USB outlets. The hotel serves breakfast as well, which is minimal but actually rather tasty. Free coffee and tea throughout the day. There is a gym, a pool and a business center, they are all quiet small but serviceable. btw- the staff is excellent, helpful and friendly, this is what ultimately gave this facility the 5th star; very much worth the visit.
Manager Response: ngap_82, what a great review. Pretty awesome and I thank you so much.  Love the feedback concerning every aspect of your stay especially the team.  We do home to see you again soon. Thank you.

Summary: The hotel is new and well kempt, although the bed sheets had long hair on. We asked for new clean sheets, other than that it seemed hospitable and quite clean throughout.  One other down side is breakfast, which very poor. Basic, limited and almost like baby food.Glad I had alternative food, but the coffee is good.
Manager Response: True_innsight, thanks for the feedback, it's unfortunate that we did not meet your breakfast standards and I am extremely happy that our team were quick to remedy the bed sheets situation, my sincerest apologies for that and the inconvenience.  We do look forward to your next visit and hopefully we can make it right and better.

Summary Heading: Great access to Irvine and south LA
Summary: Great location for business trips to Irvine. The bar had a great selection of drinks and cool staff. The rooms are clean and the complimentary breakfast is really varied and good. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Nicklasson, thank you for your feedback. We appreciated you chose to stay with us over the holiday season. It seems you  had a great time and I'm hoping and wishing only the best for you and your family this new year.

Summary: Highly recommended. Extremely clean! Excellent receptionists. Easy parking. Good location. Very good breakfast. Definitely will go back. 5 stars review from me! This review coming from a person who stays at a hotel at least once every months.
Manager Response: Aousa698, thank you so much for the recommendation to others as well as the 5 star review and feedback. We are all happy that we were a small part of your experience and was able to meet your expectations. Thank you and Happy Holidays.  Best of 2022 to you and your family.

Summary: In town for volleyball tournament at Laguna Volleyball Club.  Hotel was very nice and in a good location close to route about 15 minutes from club and close to several food choices including The Hat and Starbucks.
Manager Response: Kjarper32, we appreciate your kind words and your time to give us your feedback. It seems we met your expectations and are happy to have been part of your experience.  We are to welcome you back when you are in the area. Happy Holidays.

Summary: We are thankful to Evan and his team at Hampton!!  We had to be in town for a few days for my husband's surgery.  The property is beautifully maintained, and  the staff is incredibly accommodating.  They made a very stressful few days much easier!
Manager Response: Danettep537, it was our pleasure to have to stay at our property. I'm happy to know that we were a home away from home was was able to accommodate you and your husband during his surgery.  I'm glad it all worked out and went well.  Anytime you are in town, we will be happy to have to here and I know our team is looking forward to your next visit.  Happy Holidays to you and your family.

Summary: This hotel is extremely nice and very clean. The staff are extremely nice and I love how they have complimentary coffee and hot chocolate throughout the day. It’s in a perfect location and very safe area as well. Will stay here again.
Manager Response: Anieseparker, thank you for choosing to stay with us. We appreciate the feedback and we are so happy to accommodate your needs, even if it's just to have coffee and hot chocolate available all day.  We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay..but there were a couple of things that could’ve been better.  The bathrooms really need exhaust fans….strange that they didn’t…and a few more towels upon arrival r appreciated…so we don’t have to call housekeeping…Finalky, there was a great deal of noise from some adjacent rooms…we believe there was a soccer and or cheerleading team staying there…let’s just say they must’ve been practicing!  😆
Manager Response: Antarescampbell, thank you for the review and your rating, much appreciated by our team. We do apologize about the noise from the soccer team, it is not always like this. We appreciate your feedback concerning the exhaust fans. We do hope that you will come back to visit us again and give us another opportunity.

Summary: Great Hotel, very convenient to outside accommodations and freeways. The hotel is very well designed and well maintained. Hotel staff is very courteous and helpful with outside site information. Best hotel we stayed at in our month long trip
Manager Response: rfinke918, thanks for the feedback. Our team was honored to be part of the experience and are just grateful that your stay was a great one. Thank you.

Summary: We had our tram meeting here and it was excellent!!!  First of all, it was extremely easy to coordinate with Marlo and Aloha. They made sure everything was as expected at every turn. The meeting space was clean and very spacious for our 20 attendees. We were assigned someone to assist us with every question through the day. He stayed on the schedule we gave regarding air wall closure/open, lunch, etc.  We were all extremely satisfied with all the staff as well as the meeting room!!
Manager Response: This is truly an amazing review and we appreciate that you think time to share your experience with the world. I'm happy that our team met your expectations and went above and beyond in the delivery of our service to you and your team. Thank you for allowing us to be part of it and we look forward to the next event.

Summary: Nice place to stay very quiet and lots of places near by where you  can find good food to eat. I like that there was many places to walk to and around the facility. The place there is very clean I would definitely go there again.
Manager Response: myfantaz2001, this is so true. Our property is a nice place and as noted lots of places near by.  I am that your had an outstanding experience with us and that you took the time to share it. We so much appreciate it and our team would love to have you stay with us again, Thank you for your kind words.

Summary: Stayed 2 separate nights over a long weekend. Hotel is located on a block of several new hotels. This is the one to select! It's new so you'd expect it to be clean but constant cleaning is very visible & is keeping it that way (floors & room cleaning). Staff throughout the hotel (housekeepers & cafe folks) greet you with a sincere "Good morning!"  On both stays, our pre-selected rooms were ready (at 3:00 & 4:00), front desk staff at check in & out was friendly & receptive to a suggested room tweak (loose toilet paper holder), and best of all-- the Breakfast buffet to open to SELF-selection & is well stocked with Hot food (including egg, bacon, sausage, potatoes). Book this hotel before price escalates!!
Manager Response: Thanks for your recent review and recommendations. We are all so happy that you found our hotel to be fabulous. Happy everything was to your satisfaction.

Summary Heading: New, super clean, nice neighbourhood, would stay there again and again
Summary: Great hotel, super clean, great for a family trip, convenient location, very close to Laguna beach at a much more reasonable prices, 2nd time staying there and never to disappoint, good complimentary breakfast, coffee and tea available all day free of charge
Manager Response: Monterlea13, thank you so much. Was happy to read you recent comments. Our team does an excellent job in keeping our entire hotel super clean. We hope to see you again and again.

Summary: I have never felt more comfortable at a hotel! I’m so glad we stayed here. Great location and very quiet. I am a clean freak and our room passed the test. Front desk was very welcoming. Our experience was awesome and we will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: fmg519, I want to thank you for your recent stay with us. I'm happy to hear that your entire stay was comfortable and having a clean hotel and room created an awesome experience.  I do hope that you will visit us again when you are in the area.  Again, thank you for sharing your experience.

Summary Heading: They won’t let your  charge your EV here
Summary: Nice place, clean and good breakfast.  If you bring your EV car, don’t plan on charging.  You plug it and, go to bed to only find they unplugged it.  So, your departure is delayed while you find another charger.
Manager Response: AZsoccertraveler, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we’re very sorry you were unhappy with your stay. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.

Summary: A fabulous place to hold our Convention of 60 people. The meeting room was always clean, the A/V worked, the coffee bar tended, the sleeping quarters disinfected, the parking at no additional cost. For the needs of our group, we were extremely pleased with the outcome of our convention. Thank you!
Manager Response: JohnofHuntingtonBch, I wanted to say thanks for your recent stay and attending your district convention here at our hotel! I hope you felt at home. I am also happy that our team extend such a warm welcome which reflected in the details during your convention. We are so glad that it all work out and we met your expectations.   We can’t  wait to welcome you home again!

Summary: We had our daughter's 21st birthday party in the ballroom at the Hampton Suites on Lake Forest in Irvine and needless to say I was overwhelmed and nervous. We had never thrown a party of that size before and had no idea how to. Luckily for us the Hampton has a party planning angel on their staff. Thanks to Aloha Gonzalez, the Hamptons event consultant, our party was a complete success! She walked us through every step with planning the food menu and letting us know if we needed to add more or decrease certain food items, she was in contact with all of our outside vendors and made sure they were all on the same page and that things would be dropped off and set up in time for the party and she did it all with such patience and care. The day of the party she was there helping set
Manager Response: Jennifersandersm, I wanted to say thanks for having your recent event here at our hotel! We are so happy that everything went according to plan and thanks to our great team for the entire execution from the beginning to end to make sure that you and your guests were extremely satisfied. Thank you for allowing us to share in joy and excitement of celebrating your daughter's birthday.

Summary Heading: SuperClean hotel and room. Great staff.
Summary: Very Clean hotel. Hand sanitizer and surface wipes provided throughout hotel. Felt very comfortable staying here. Room was super clean. The hotel staff was extremely helpful. The complimentary breakfast is always delicious.
Manager Response: cggzman, I wanted to say thanks for your recent stay here at our hotel! I agree staying in a hotel that is super clean with great and amazing staff says a lot about the property.  I hope you felt at home and we certainly can’t  wait to welcome you home again soon!  Thank you!!!

Summary: Great stay at the hotel.  Staff was very pleasant.  The young lady in the breakfast area took great pride in her job.  She asked if there was anything I needed and was friendly and very clean.  Well after breakfast she was mopping the floor and wished me a good day.  Just great
Manager Response: I wanted to say thanks for your recent stay here at our hotel! I hope you felt at home. I am also happy that our team extend such a warm welcome which reflected in her job, thank you for acknowledging her.  We can’t  wait to welcome you home again soon!

Summary: The place is conveniently located next to the freeway but you don’t hear it. Rooms are large and clean and NEW! Overall good place, just try to stay on the 5th floor so you don’t have someone above you.
Manager Response: I wanted to say thanks for your recent stay here at our hotel! I hope you felt at home.  We can’t  wait to welcome you home again soon!

Summary Heading: Modern hotel + impeccably clean + friendly team
Summary: The hotel is new, beautifully decorated and incredibly clean. Another perk is the beds are comfortable and sheets smell fresh. We couldn’t be more pleased with our stay and love the hospitality Lauren and Rose have showed us at breakfast each morning!
Manager Response: Ali B, such a wonderful review.  Thank you for taking the time to share such amazing comments about your experience. To hear you say that you love the hospitality if Lauren and Rose brings joy to my heart.  Simply AMAZING.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: Wow! Positive, attentive and helpful staff!
Summary: In a time where the hospitality industry has been stressed and stretched, I wanted to call out that this Hampton Inn had several staff that really shined! I don’t know any of these people, and have never stayed at this location before (but am a frequent traveler in general).   Shout outs to: Michael at the bar, mentioned he was new, who went out of his way to be friendly and responsive. Then in the morning, Lauren and Rose at the breakfast room - Lauren could not have been any more positive,  helpful, and attentive. Even the gentleman cleaning the public restroom, kind and courteous!   All of their positivity was refreshing and contagious! Seemingly rare in these times, keep it up! The facility was new, clean, well kept!
Manager Response: WOW, that says it all. Totally agree with your assessment and appreciate your feedback about your recent experience.  Thank you so much for sharing it with the world.  We do hope you come back and visit us.

Summary: Stayed 3 nights from July 30 to August 2 and it was a decent place to stay. Place looked clean; room and beds were very spacious and clean. The door for the bathroom was broken though and kept getting stuck which was annoying. The comforter was a bit scratchy and itchy on one side but overall the beds were comfortable.   Information on their website/app is not up to date so you should call or ask the front desk ahead of time if needed. The lady that checked us in was friendly but the others I interacted with had a bit of an attitude like I was annoying them. Parking required a small fee of $7/night  but the place has lots of parking so it's nice if you have a car with you.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel.  We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were not able to meet all your expectations. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.

Summary: We stayed at the Hampton Inn Irvine Spectrum for a family event.  The room was good size and comfortable for the four of us.  Conveniently located and surrounded by other similar hotels.  I would stay here again if the price was similar to the other hotels in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we very much appreciate your feedback.  Our team are extremely to in providing excellent service which entails having clean room and top of the line service.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Hotel is clean, centrally located but front desk staff get an "F".
Summary: Clean, buffet breakfast with hot and cold, busy location but front desk staff could not get two rooms assigned correctly or understand the duration so my brother, who needed a handicap room, was locked out a day prior to his leaving.  They also mischarged his parking to me.  And, their handicap rooms have step over tubs???   Can't imagine that is ADA compliant.  Won't stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we’re very sorry you were unhappy with your stay. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.

Summary: Really friendly staff, clean rooms and really great for families and being by yourself. Definitely will stay here again! The breakfast was good and filling as well but you do have to get up early as 6 am in order to beat everyone else until 9 am.
Manager Response: Lilbabe2021, thanks for the "The Best Hotel" review.  I'm sure like myself all other travelers appreciates it.  Thank you so much!

Summary: Superb. Immaculately clean. Friendly staff. Delicious hot breakfast. The pool was very clean and relaxing. Decor is modern and new. Beds were deliciously comfortable as is always expected from the Hilton brand.
Manager Response: Dear KarisU5630G, thank you for your 5 star rating and sharing your recent experience while staying with us.  Having a comfortable bed is so important and necessary to be able to have a relaxed and comfortable sleep.  We hope to see you again the next time you are in the area.

Summary: It was a wonderful experience. From politeness of the staff to cleanliness of the hotel. The hot open buffet breakfast was also notable. You should definitely give this one a chance. You could easily say that the staff loves what they are doing and it is reflected in their performance for sure.
Manager Response: Serdarozen, this is breathtaking to read.  I share this knowing that not only myself but my entire team do love what we are doing and it's our utmost pleasure to serve our guests.  You all makes us happy and gives us a reason to come to work.  We are all happy that you had a wonderful experience and took the time to share it with others. Thank you.

Summary: Just needed to get away for a night and found the Hampton inn by Hilton in Lake Forest. I was amazed at how easy it was to book a room! The hotel is very modern and sleek as well as incredibly clean! For just having a night out, and for any other future reasons, I will definitely be staying here again. Staff was so friendly and helpful and the rooms were so nice! 10/10 would recommend 😊
Manager Response: Dear Elodubz, sometimes that's all we need is a staycation. I glad you were able to find us and our team was able to create the environment for you to have an amazing experience.  We hope to see you again on your next staycation.

Summary: Right off the 5 freeway, close to the John Wayne airport, shipping, beaches. Very gorgeous hotel, friendly staff, great customer service. Over all, the best hotel in the area and also very clean. The breakfast is amazing, has something for every one.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your thoughts and experience.  I'm glad that were in the perfection location and that we were able to accommodate you.  Do come back and visit us. Thank you.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay, the room was clean and the hotel staff were professional, friendly and accommodating.  We will plan to stay again on our next trip. Great location, highly recommend, quiet and peaceful
Manager Response: Frequestflier552188, thank you for your recent stay.  Thanks for sharing your experience and the great review, much appreciated by our team.

Summary: Had a Freezing cold room and could never get it fixed.  I called front desk with only a answer that it would change in 10 min.  After 30-40 min called Hilton Customer Service who was able to get front desk to send a maintenance person.  Who came and said he would change the temperature at his main station.  Came back after dinner and the room was still FREEZING.  Not a good way to treat any guest.
Manager Response: Dear rjair2021  I  just had a chance to review your comments regarding your stay with us. I am so sorry to here that it did not go so well. As you can see in all of our reviews good or bad, we do our best to ensure every guest is happy when they leave the hotel and are completely satisfied with their stay. I am so sorry that we did not do enough to solve the AC/Heating issue in your room. We certainly fell short.  I do wan to thank you for sharing your experience as this gives us the opportunity to work at the issue so that any future guest will not have the same experience.   Please reach out to me as I am eager to get you taken care of and at least satisfied so you will give us another opportunity. Know that your comments are heard and we are looking into other ways to fix the issue mentioned in your review.  Again, a sincere thanks for sharing with us.

Summary: I was expecting my usual Diamond member service. I always make online reservations in advance. I am flexible in beds but request top floor with foam pillows. When I checked in I was abruptly told NO top floor rooms available when asked. When I got to the room my nose immediately stuffed up, indicating they did not change out to foam pillows. I got spoiled at Hilton Garden Inn Irvine so I expect the same service everywhere. I discovered it’s not the same everywhere!
Manager Response: Hello jimmartin101,  my apologies for not meeting your expectations.  It seems we fell short in providing top of the line service; I would feel the same and expect the same service as a Diamond member at every Hilton property.  I do hope you would give us another opportunity to make it up.  We do thank you for sharing your experience and feedback, we appreciate it.

Summary: The place is always clean I have stayed at this place a couple times and it gets better every time and employees are welcoming! We felt safe coming back even after a late night out. I will definitely come back!
Manager Response: raizacalip, it's always refreshing when our guest continuously have great stays and as you noted, it's even better every time.  Reading such reviews as your would definitely make me want to stay as well. Thank you!

Summary: This place is our favorite when in Orange County. Iliana and Lloyd are always so welcoming with a warm smile and complimentary greeting every time they see me. Go above and beyond to make sure our stays are always top notch. Comfy, clean rooms minutes away from a sprawling night life or ocean relaxation. 5 out of 5 all day!!!
Manager Response: Mike, what a breath of fresh air to read such wonderful comments about our hotel and to top it off about our amazing team.  Iliana and Lloyd are truly an asset to our hotel and I appreciate that they go above and beyond to make your stay a 5-Star experience.  Thank you for always coming back.

Summary Heading: Stay Clear there are many more options in Orange County
Summary: Buyer beware!!! Horrible Service from the Asst General Manager. This Manager refused service to me, my wife and son for the sole reason he did not like that I was disappointed that my room was not ready at 3pm as promised on the app. His go to was if you don't like it here then you don't have to stay here and then refused service! This is how this Mgr defines Hospitality. I have had many interactions with hotel stays over the many years of travel but this was a first! There was certainly something that he did not like about me and I can't quite put my finger on it but I guess that's the best way to keep people from taking advantage of their 100% guarantee... simply don't let them stay there!
Manager Response: We are sorry we were not able to provide you with a better quality of service. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we take our commitment to our 100% Guarantee very seriously.  Thank you for your feedback and we hope you will come back and stay with us  again.

Summary: Lloyd at the front desk was amazing. Companies need employees like him. Very professional and welcoming. Great hotel to stay at. It was very clean and stylish. The hotel is close to restaurants and shopping areas. You will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: iman20212021, you so correct and we thank you for recognizing Lloyd. He is truly and asset.  I too have seen his professionalism and how much he displays hospitality.  We do appreciate team members such as Lloyd, especially knowing that he goes above and beyond in creating great customer service. We are happy that you were able to experience such service.

Summary: The hotel was perfect in every way. Clean. Great location. Excellent service. Julian at the front desk made check in quick and way. He also helped with setting up wifi. The hotel was clean and well maintained. Very comfortable and quiet.
Manager Response: Kp0888, I'm thrilled that you had a great stay at our Hampton Inn while in Lake Forest.  Your 5-star experience all round was outstanding.  To top it off, Julian was instrumental in a making your experience amazing Again, thank you for choosing to stay and if you are ever back in the area, we certainly hope to see you again.

Summary: Hampton Inns are quickly becoming a favorite of mine. This location did not disappoint! Hampton cleanliness is always superb and the color/design choices are wonderful, inviting, & relaxing! The finishes are always so nice and really make me feel like I’m getting great value for my money! The complimentary covered parking at this location was a bonus and pleasant surprise. Being able to reserve, check in/out, and access a digital key all through the app are such wonderfully convenient features & make this ideal for last min reservations & late nights check-ins. Hampton Inn will always be my first choice!
Manager Response: Hello Amyrochelle124, Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn, we are happy to hear you stay with us was wonderful as we strive to provide the best service and experience . We hope to see in the future .

Summary: Stayed here in April of 2021. Hotel was nice and clean, highly recommend! Rooms were nice, Great location and staff was very friendly. There is a Starbucks across the street and easy access to freeway
Manager Response: Hello Daydream62070150896, we are happy to hear that the staff experience was great and your stay comfortable.

Summary: After I booked this hotel through HH service representative, I called to make sure we get a room on the top floor.  Staff Julian said he will make a note for my request.  The day before the trip, I called again to remind them my request.  Lloyd at  the front desk reassured me that I will get their best room. We did stayed at a very nice and clean room on the top floor.  All the staffs there were friendly and helpful.  I recommend this hotel and will come back for another stay.
Manager Response: Hello CLBL2021 , thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn and to hear that Julian and Lloyd were able to take care of your request and to make sure they were met. We are happy that your stay with us was great. We hope to see you in the future.

Summary: Nice place, easily accessible but the air conditioning didn’t work and maintenance wasn’t readily available. The biggest problem was lack of follow through in addressing the issue. I had to take tge initiative and express anger before they offer changing my room.
Manager Response: Hello Privano2004, We apologies and complete under your concern for the air conditioning not working. I am sorry it took some time for the staff to make it right by moving your room to a room with a working air conditioner. We hope you do give another chance and have a better experience at the hotel.

Summary: Over all good value we have stayed at property before this time having more issues with room - we did have to switch as the door was not working properly so anyone could push it and come in - some room cleaning issues- pool area  not kept clean - however customer service was good. We enjoyed that they had grab and go options that were pre packaged for breakfast. We would stay again if in the area.
Manager Response: Hello April L, we apologies for the door not closing as that is a concern for us to keep you and your family safe during your stay with us. Cleanliness is our top priority as we want everyone to enjoy and feel safe during their stay. We hope the next time you stay with us, your stay would be amazing .

Summary: I’m so satisfied with my and my husbands stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton.. the property was soo clean and all Covid-19 protocols were met. The staff is wonderful and so polite and helps you with everything you may need during your stay. The room was so clean and comfortable. The location is great near the Irvine Spectrum and other shopping centers and dining.. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the Lake Forrest/Irvine area... I have no complaints!!! Wonderful
Manager Response: Hello MrsCook3 , we are pleased to hear that your stay with us was wonderful and the cleaning and COVID-19 protocols were met . We are happy are staff went above and beyond to make you stay wonderful. We hope to see you in future.

Summary: Floors/walls have extremely poor insulation. We could especially hear everything above us. Just walking on the floor above us sounded like someone was weightlifting/stomping on the ground (for hours on end). Even the vacuuming above us by housekeeping was extremely loud. This was so distracting it made it very difficult to sleep. There were multiple different guests who stayed on the floor above us during our stay and even with quieter guests above us it sounded like pounding construction work until everyone was sleeping above us (well into the night/early morning). The fire alarm also woke us up on our last night, and instead of being reset once it was deemed safe we were told that the staff didn’t know how to reset it and had to wait for maintenance to come in. Strobe light
Manager Response: Hello bste24,  Thank you for taking the time to write us a review! We are sorry to hear about the issues that you had during your stay. We will make sure to discuss and coach the staff on the items you had mentioned. We hope to have another opportunity to provide you with a great stay in the future. Have a great rest of your day.

Summary: Had an issue with the hotel (jacuzzi was broken and that’s the whole thing we were looking forward to in winter) and tried to call them in a calm way, they refused to talk to me because I was a third party (meaning booked through Priceline). Rude, but I kept going and called Priceline. Priceline tried calling and they refused because “there was no guarantee about the jacuzzi” when I booked. Not to mention the hotel keeps you on hold for more than 6 minutes when you their front desk. Beware.
Manager Response: Hello OCtraveler24, thank you for choosing to stay with us. We certainly appreciate your feedback . Concerning your recent experience while staying with us, we do apologize for the inconvenience.

Summary: This is a newer hotel. We loved it. Perfect location. Everything is within 5 mile radius. We had great food options and great shopping. We had a corner room with lots of windows and a huge TV.  It is very quiet and friendly staff. Recommended hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for stay at the Hampton Inn Irvine Spectrum Lake Forest, we are happy to hear your stay was great and the staff were accommodating.

Summary: The hotel is new so still working a few things out and with this covid stuff, I have to say they are doing very well. Rooms were nice altho it was a visit for my birthday I would have liked a room with a view. That was no fault of there's though. The staff was very nice and helpful. Especially Iliana. She was very accommodating, friendly and did her best to insure a good visit for my friends and I. If ever back in the area, I will definitely stay with them. Thanks again Iliana!   Sincerely, The purple haired woman and her friends!
Manager Response: Thank you for stay at the Hampton Inn Irvine Spectrum Lake Forest . We are happy that you celebrated your birthday with us, I am happy that are staff made your stay comfortable .

Summary: fantastic, she was terrific she helped me so much and was very nice I will only stay here because of her It was a great hotel and super clean It was a really great experience because of the people who worked there
Manager Response: Thank you for stay at the Hampton Inn Irvine Spectrum Lake Forest, we are happy to hear your stay was great and the staff were accommodating.

Summary: Our stay was incredible. Such a gorgeous room and view. The front receptionist Iliana was so generous and helped tremendously. Her service made me feel welcomed from when I entered!!! Incredible place a must stay!!!
Manager Response: Hi Amygalvira,  Thank you for your positive feedback during your recent stay at our property! We are delighted to know that you enjoyed your stay and the wonderful amenities that were provided! We are also pleased to know that Iliana was exceptional during your stay! We cannot wait to welcome you back in the near future! Take care!

Summary: I love Hampton Inns and this was my first time staying at this location.  It is conveniently located with great freeway access.  I appreciate the option of parking in a covered area.  It was very easy to get right to the elevator and to my room from my parking spot.  The staff is exceptional and the room was lovely.   I will be back for sure!!!
Manager Response: Dear H1153YJsueh,  Thank your for your amazing review during your recent stay with us! We are delighted to know that your overall experience was exceptional! And that our hotel was your #1 choice when booking. We cannot wait to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay- just like home!
Summary: The Homewood Suites are just the thing for you to relax and stay for a couple of days. Close to all kinds of eateries, and within 5 minutes of Irvine Spectrum. The Suite itself was very comfortable, and the amenities included a full kitchen (full size refrigerator, all dishes, utensils, microwave, electric stove, toaster). Shower was good pressure, and hot water on demand. Room had ceiling fan, with control panel. Plenty of room to stretch out and relax! Hilton cleaning protocols are spot on, and the staff treated us like family. We especially want to give a shout out to ILIANA, the front desk associate that gave us such excellent service- explained what we needed to know about Homewood Suites.
Manager Response: Hi Joes1914,  Thank you for the amazing review during your recent stay with us! We are delighted to know that your overall stay was relaxing and that you felt at home! That is our #1 mission is to ensure that every guest feels like our hotel is their home away from home! We thank you for the positive review and cannot wait to welcome you again soon!

Summary: This is  a really great new hotel  I've stayed here maybe 10 times in the past 2 months.  Easy access off 5 (like 100 yards) and next to a  strip mall with goo food places.  But he rooms are spot on.  Plenty of outlets, temperature control is easy, and just everything is in the right place.   I feel safe here:  everything seems to be routinely sanitized.   As much as possible they strive to make the hotel experience good, even in lock-down.,   They just opened their lobby bare (5-9), and it is fantastic.  Michelle is  a fun and cool bartender.   And the guests are great too.  I met the management here too, (Nigel and Amber).   I see where the care for customers comes from.  So I guesx you can tell I really recommend this place .
Manager Response: Dear Bill K, thank you for an amazing review during your recent stay with us! I am delighted to know that you are able to enjoy the easy access that we offer for our guests such as the close proximity of the freeways to the amazing restaurants nearby! We also want to thank you for the amazing shoutout to our staff! Thank you again Bill K for the amazing review. Have a wonderful week!

Summary Heading: Another great stay. Iliana really goes above and beyond!
Summary: This hotel and it's staff are very friendly. The rooms are super clean. As a matter of fact, Iliana apparently does the front desk and works with housekeeping directly to keep things extra sparkly. She also has a friendly can do attitude. It seems to be shared by the staff as well. If something isn't right they try hard to make it so. Would recommend! Another great stay!
Manager Response: Dear GeorgeS5704,  Thank you again for your ongoing business with Hilton and our property. We definitely love our regular guests as we love to ensure everyone feels at home! It is also great to know that Iliana has been a star during your stay! We will definitely recognize her amazing customer service and positive attitude!

Summary: ILIANA has been very helpful with my stay at this Brand new hotel. Very nice people, great crew with super nice manager (Amber).  I have been staying here multiple times, and has always bee enjoyable. This is the Best experience I have staying at hotel. I will say this is the Best hotel in the area.  Also like to mention Sonja, who has been very kind and super nice with my previous stay.  Overall experience is awesome. Great deal directly via the Hilton website. Thank you, thank you... Thank you!
Manager Response: Good evening Best_Caregiver,  To start off with, thank you for the amazing shout out to our staff Iliana and Soonja who ensured your stay was nothing but amazing! We definitely love the positive feedback during your recent stay with us. We also want to thank you for your ongoing business with us and always choosing us as your #1 property to stay! We definitely appreciate that. We cannot wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Awesome place to stay! We will definitely stay here again!
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for the entire Labor Day weekend even when we lived 50 miles away. We needed a place to stay to escape the heat and be close by to the beach. I was impressed how clean it was. Plenty of parking spaces. Location is pretty accessible. A short drive to Laguna Beach, Dana Point and the best part it was pretty close to Irvine Spectrum Center. Plenty of restaurants across the street too.  The best part of our stay was their customer service. Shoutout to Meia and Lliana for an exceptional customer service. Thank you and we will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Good Afternoon 945radaa,  I want to thank you for your amazing review during your stay with us on Labor Day Weekend! It is delightful to know that you were able to enjoy the amenities provided and also the close proximity we are from restaurants, freeway and the beach. Since COVID started, it was our number 1 priority to ensure our rooms are clean and sanitized for every guest! We also want to thank you for the amazing  shoutout for our staff members! We cannot wait to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary: I came during the weekday for business and I was greeted by supervisor Meia. First off can I just say how amazed I am by her customer service? She was very friendly and professional. Since I’m from Washington I needed assistance with finding places to eat and stores nearby for groceries, she went out of her way to check what’s open and to even call to see if the restaurant were doing dine in. All and all, she took very good care of me. I will definitely come back not just for the new modern styled hotel but because of the great service I received! Thanks Meia for the awesome service. Your hotel is lucky to have you!!!
Manager Response: Good Evening Johnnyboyseattle1989,  First and foremost thank you for the amazing review during your recent stay at our property. I am delighted to know that your overall stay was amazing and that you also enjoyed our new property just as much as us. I also want to thank you for the positive recognition! Our#1 priority is to ensure that we exceed our guests expectations. We want to ensure that everyone feels at home and that our staff are always willing to help. Thank you again for the amazing review! We cannot wait to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary: Hotel is in an area of a lot of brand new hotel construction.  Not a fan of the dual-branded concept here.  The same building houses a Homewood Suites.  I stayed at a similar type property in Denver and it was confusing as is this one.   There is a separate Homewood Suites lounge that all Hampton Inn guests pass by...does that mean I can or can’t use it?    They are diluting their brand.    Also are they breakfasts/other amenities the same? No idea.  The room was fairly comfortable...bed was nice and room was clean and quiet.  There was a big service issue though.  Twice I came in and the front desk wasn’t attended.  One time there were multiple people waiting for at least 5 minutes.  There was someone sitting in the lounge who then got up and started attending to guests after
Manager Response: Hello Miamilocal1,  Thank you for taking the time to write your feedback on your recent stay at our dual property. First, I would like to apologize about the confusion of both brands. At the moment due to COVID-19, we do have minimal amenities open to ensure we are practicing social distancing. Secondly, as soon as everything operates normally everything will be secluded by brands but as of right now we have it open for everyone! As a valued guest we sincerely apologize that we did not exceed your expectations. Your comments and feedback will continually help us provide a better guest experience. We do hope in the near future that you will give us another chance to win back your business. Thank you and have a great rest of your week

Summary: All the staff are to be commended. Niguel went above and beyond. IIiana at the front desk is a valuable asset to the team.  She is very knowledgeable, positive and very helpful. I'm glad she was there to welcome me on arrival and handle my departure.  Thank you very  much!..
Manager Response: Good evening Yourbrokerpaul,  We want to thank you for giving an amazing shout out to our awesome manager Nigel and our front desk staff Iliana! It is delightful to know that they exceeded your expectations and overall made your stay feel welcoming! We look forward to welcoming you in the near future!
